divs: Sighting DetailsI'm a work doing my normal stuff had to take out the trash that was next. Well i just to look up at the stars because i looking at them, anyway i see waht look like a star slowly going across the sky. i know waht a airplane looked like at night and this was not it.. So im watchin this thing and i see a second one behind it... i keep watch it. It turns quickly it make like a S shape and the second on followed right behind it. I was kind of freked out i dont won't if i thought i was see in things or what. Because i watch UFO Hunters and to see one for myself I'm shocked to tell u the truth. After it did its S shape there was a hotel behind us and i lose sight of it. I'm not making this up. Please belive me.
